casebody.data:
STATE
v.
Sandra Meshell BRICE 244PA16-1 Supreme Court of North Carolina. March 9, 2017 Daniel Lawrence Spiegel, Assistant Appellate Defender, for Brice, Sandra Meshell. Staples Hughes, Durham. Daniel P. O'Brien, Special Deputy Attorney General, Nancy D. Hardison, Assistant Attorney General, Kristin Jo Uicker, Assistant Attorney General, David Learner, District Attorney, for State of North Carolina.

The following order has been entered on the Motion for Extension of Time to File Brief filed on the 9th of March 2017 by Defendant:

"Motion Allowed by order of the Court in conference, this the 9th of March 2017."

Defendant shall have up to and including the 12th day of April 2017 to file and serve his/her brief with this Court.
